full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tuba Supply Contract - Canadian Armed Forces

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a request for proposals (RFP) for the supply and delivery of a Tuba instrument to the Royal Canadian Artillery Band of the Canadian Armed Forces in Edmonton, Alberta.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Title**: Supply and Delivery of a Tuba Instrument
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS3632343002
* **RFP Number**: WS3632343002
* **Publication Date**: November 1, 2022
* **Closing Date**: December 1, 2022, at 14:00 HAE (Harris Adams Electric)
* **Submission Method**: Electronic submission via the CanadaBuys portal or Ariba Discovery platform

### Important Note
Amendment to Closing Time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 HAE on December 1, 2022. Bids submitted after 14:00 HAE on December 1, 2022, will be declared non-responsive.

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Wiebe, Lyland
	+ **Email**: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ **Phone**: [None]
	+ **Fax**: [None]

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Type**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Preference**: Subject to a preference for Canadian goods
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Alberta
* **Regions of Delivery**: Edmonton, Alberta

### Notice Information

* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14518400?extsite=MTQ1MTg0MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Attachment**: None
